job_description:
Responsibilities: About the Organization Chhaya Technologies Limited is a pioneering technology-based organization working to ensure easily accessible and affordable digital healthcare services for the general population of Bangladesh. Through innovative Chhaya Digital Health Packages , healthcare services are being made easily accessible in various regions of the country. The organization is working with a skilled sales team consisting of young, entrepreneurial, and hardworking individuals. Position Field Sales Officer Workplace Field: Any area in the Dhaka division Minimum Educational Qualification SSC or equivalent Experience 6 months - 1 year (Freshers can also apply) Job Type Full-time (Day shift) Working Hours: 8 hours per day Salary and Benefits Basic Salary: BDT 10,500 (fixed) TA/DA: BDT 2,600 (at a rate of BDT 100 per day) Sales Commission: BDT 5,000 - 20,000 Additional Benefits: Attractive promotions, star bonuses, and monthly top performer rewards Other Benefits: Annual salary increment 2 festival bonuses per year Responsibilities Work in densely populated areas such as metro rail platforms, major markets, bus stands, fairs, railway stations, and shopping malls. Directly engage with customers to sell Chhaya Digital Health Packages . Achieve daily sales targets. Collect information from interested customers and register them through the app. Provide daily sales and activity reports. Qualifications Minimum SSC/HSC pass. Must be proficient in using smartphones. Must be enthusiastic and patient in direct sales work. Good communication skills and self-confidence are required. Must have a mindset to work in an outdoor environment. Experience Freshers can also apply. Preference will be given to experienced candidates in sales, customer service, field sales, marketing, or insurance. Contact Head Office & Interview Location: House No. 1230 (Flat 3-B), Road No. 12, Avenue 9, Mirpur DOHS, Dhaka-1216 Contact: 01339774755

job_title: Recruitment Field Executive тАУ Manpower Sourcing (Overseas Jobs)
company_address: Baridhara DOHS, House 486 Road No. 8, Dhaka 1212
job_description:
Responsibilities: Shomvob is hiring a Recruitment Field Executive to support large-scale overseas manpower sourcing through field recruitment camps, agent coordination, and community-based sourcing. This role requires regular field visits, direct candidate interaction, and close collaboration with local agents and community leaders.

Key Responsibilities:
- Organize and run recruitment camps in different districts and upazilas.
- Coordinate with Training Institutes, local agents, sub-agents, and community leaders.
- Source blue-collar candidates for overseas jobs (construction, factory, cleaning, driving, hospitality, etc.).
- Conduct initial screening of candidates (age, experience, skills, documents).
- Explain overseas job details clearly (country, salary, benefits, costs, process).
- Collect and verify candidate documents (passport, photos, certificates, videos).
- Ensure candidates are properly registered in Shomvob recruitment system.
- Follow up with candidates for interviews, trade tests, medical, and documentation.
- Maintain daily field activity reports and candidate sourcing updates.
- Ensure ethical recruitment practices and transparent communication with candidates.
- Support deployment coordination until visa issuance.

Required Qualifications & Skills:
- Minimum HSC/Bachelor's degree (Bachelor preferred).
- 1-3 years of experience in field recruitment, manpower sourcing, NGO field work, or sales/marketing preferred.
- Strong communication skills in Bangla and English.
- Willingness to travel extensively across districts.
- Experience working with agent networks or community sourcing is a strong advantage.
- Basic smartphone and data entry skills (Google Forms, WhatsApp, Excel).
- Honest, energetic, and people-friendly personality.

Job Type & Location:
- Employment Type: Full-time.
- Location: Field-based (Bangladesh-wide).
- Department: Shomvob Global.

Why Join Shomvob:
- Direct involvement in safe and ethical overseas employment.
- Opportunity to work at the grassroots level with real impact.
- Exposure to international manpower projects.
- Performance-based growth opportunities.

Trend Awareness: Staying updated with digital trends and AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Canva) to enhance efficiency.

- Maintain a clean and hygienic personal workspace, assigned section, and overall store environment, including equipment and display areas.
- Contribute to a collaborative team environment by working flexibly across different sections, actively participating in training programs, and supporting colleagues to ensure seamless operations.
- Promote special offers and gather customer feedback to help achieve outlet sales targets.

Greet and assist customers, address inquiries and concerns, and create a positive shopping experience. Receive incoming merchandise, verify quality and expiration dates, update pricing and promotional labels, and create visually appealing product displays. Replenish shelves, rotate stock effectively, identify and report overstock for markdowns, and minimize waste. Operate the point-of-sale (POS) system, process transactions (including billing, cash handling, voids, and returns), and adhere to standard operating procedures. Maintain a clean and hygienic personal workspace, assigned section, and overall store environment, including equipment and display areas. Contribute to a collaborative team environment by working flexibly across different sections, actively participating in training programs, and supporting colleagues to ensure seamless operations. Promote special offers and gather customer feedback to help achieve outlet sales targets.

Responsibilities: We are looking for responsible, polite, and confident individuals to join our team as a Telemarketing and Telesales Executive. The responsibilities of this position include communicating with customers over the phone, providing information about products/services, and assisting in sales activities.

Responsibilities:
- Contacting potential and existing customers over the phone
- Presenting detailed information about products and services clearly and attractively
- Resolving customer inquiries and issues
- Following up with interested customers to complete sales
- Maintaining accurate records of calls and customer-related information
- Ensuring customer satisfaction through polite and professional behavior
- Coordinating with the team to achieve daily and monthly sales targets

Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Minimum Qualification: SSC Pass Preference will be given to candidates with experience in Telesales, Telemarketing, Product Sales, or Customer Support Ability to communicate clearly, effectively, and professionally Proficiency in computer skills (MS Word, MS Excel, Email, etc.) Mindset to work responsibly and diligently Fresh candidates are also encouraged to apply (training opportunities available for qualified candidates) Work Schedule Morning 10:00 AM - Evening 9:00 PM Lunch and prayer facilities available Workplace ЁЯУН House- 82/1, Road- 02, Block- A, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka- 1212 What We Offer Friendly and supportive work environment Training and learning opportunities Opportunity for long-term work and career development

Responsibilities: ```html Gate Control: Inspect every individual entering and exiting the warehouse. Do not allow unauthorized individuals inside. Document Check: Before any truck exits, make sure to verify the invoice (delivery note) and gate pass. Manual Counting / Tally: Count each package or carton manually while loading or unloading the truck. Weight Monitoring: Ensure to weigh each truck on the scale during entry and exit. Lock & Key: Securely lock all warehouse doors and shutters at the end of work and keep the key safe. Perimeter Patrol: Regularly patrol the perimeter fence and warehouse area to check for any suspicious activities. Fire Safety: Enforce a strict "No Smoking" policy inside the warehouse to prevent fire incidents. Labor Supervision: Supervise workers to ensure no goods are being hidden or stolen during busy loading times. Night Vigilance: Stay awake and alert during the night shift using torchlight and whistle. Reporting: Immediately inform the manager if any goods are lost, damaged, or if any issues occur. Benefits: Overtime ```

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of Customer Service and Sales Executives:
- Outbound and inbound call management: Making calls to potential customers and receiving calls from interested customers.
- Providing product and service information: Clearly and professionally explaining the company's products and services to customers.
- Lead follow-up and sales conversion: Maintaining regular communication with potential leads and converting them into permanent customers.
- Data management and reporting: Updating daily work tasks and accurately storing customer information on Google Sheets or CRM.
- Providing answers to inquiries: Resolving any customer questions or doubts and assisting with accurate information.
- Achieving sales targets: Meeting the company's defined daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets.
- Maintaining customer support and relationships: Ensuring post-sales services are provided and building long-term business relationships.
- Team coordination: Coordinating with other departments for the smooth running of tasks.
- Participation in training: Attending regular training sessions to learn about products, services, and sales skills.

Courier and Delivery Management:
- Order processing and booking: Booking orders correctly on the courier portal after ensuring customer's order confirmation.
- Delivery tracking: Tracking the current location of the parcel in transit and providing regular updates to the customer.
- Return or parcel follow-up: Resolving any delivery issues or non-receipt of parcels by contacting the courier service and the customer.
- Cash on delivery (COD) coordination: Managing payment received from the courier and promptly resolving any payment-related issues.
- Parcel packing supervision: Ensuring products are packed correctly and sent through the appropriate courier service.

Requirements: Essential Qualifications and Skills (Requirements): HSC/Equivalent pass. Prior experience in tele sales or call center-related work preferred. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong mentality and self-confidence to achieve sales targets. Customer-centric attitude and problem-solving skills. Ability to learn quickly and work under pressure. Additional Skills (Good to Have): Presentation Skills. Problem-Solving Skills. Negotiation Skills. Time management and multitasking abilities. Proficiency in computer and CRM software usage. Experience in customer management through email and social media. Preference given to candidates with proficiency in communication in Bengali and English alongside other languages.

2) Providing regular water, pruning, and fertilizing trees, flowers, and lawns.
3) Following responsibilities according to the roster in various complexes in designated zones.
4) Keeping the front yard clean and the garden area well-maintained.
5) Proper use and maintenance of garden maintenance equipment.
6) Implementing seasonal plant care and monitoring plans.
7) Completing tasks according to the supervisor's instructions.

4) Must be physically fit and capable of working in the field.
5) Must be honest, responsible, and hardworking.
